level.heading: Liability for preincorporation transactions.
level.text: All persons purporting to act as or on behalf of a nonprofit corporation, knowing there was no incorporation under this chapter, shall be jointly and severally liable for all liabilities created while so acting.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
